# Summon Merchant III (Spell)
## Overview
[[Conjuration Spells|Conjuration]] ([[Summoning Spells|summoning]])

**Level:** [[3rd Level Bard Spells|Bard 3]], [[3rd Level Cleric Spells|Cleric 3]], [[3rd Level Sorcerer Spells|Sorcerer 3]], [[3rd Level Witch Spells|Witch 3]], [[3rd Level Wizard Spells|Wizard 3]]

**BoXM:** [[BoXM 5th-Level Cleric Spells List|Cleric 5]], [[BoXM 5th-Level Wizard Spells List|Wizard 5]]

**Casting Time:** 1 minute

**Components:** V, S, F (a gold coin)

**Range:** Close (25 ft. + 5 ft./2 levels)

**Effect:** One summoned merchant

**Duration:** 1 minute/level; see text

**Saving Throw:** None

**Spell Resistance:** No

**Source:** Avanced Arcana VII (Necromancers of the Northwest), pg. 63

This functions as *[[Summon Merchant II (Spell)|summon merchant II]]*, except that the merchantâ€™s base value is 500 gp, her purchase limit is 2,500 gp, she has 1d4 minor magic items and 1d2 medium magic items, and her [[Appraise (Skill)|Appraise]] and [[Spellcraft (Skill)|Spellcraft]] modifiers are +9.
